Topic.Title: Creating my own vore text adventure

Posts.EditableText:
This is my first text adventure. I’m wondering if there’s any experience people who would be willing to help me create it and put it together I will leave my contact information for Discord and Skype. I will not be putting them in pictures though it will be basically just pure text with clickable buttons and everything else.
